Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on his friendship with a thief called Musashi, the film takes place at the beginning of the Showa period when Japan was making the transition from Meiji era into modernization.
The silent black-and-white movie looks stylish juxtaposing against the visual richness of the natural environment in Wakasa Kaigan National Park.
